<style>
/* Global Styles - White Background */
html, body {
  font-family: Georgia, 'Times New Roman', Times, serif;
  line-height: 1.8;
  color: #333;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  background-color: white;
}

/* Transparent Floating Navigation Bar */
.navbar {
  background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3) !important;
  border: none !important;
  position: fixed !important;
  top: 0;
  width: 100%;
  z-index: 1000;
  backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
  -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(10px);
}

.navbar-default .navbar-brand,
.navbar-default .navbar-nav > li > a {
  color: white !important;
  text-shadow: 1px 1px 2px rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
}

.navbar-default .navbar-brand:hover,
.navbar-default .navbar-nav > li > a:hover {
  color: #f0f0f0 !important;
}

.navbar-default .navbar-toggle {
  border-color: rgba(255,255,255,0.5);
}

.navbar-default .navbar-toggle .icon-bar {
  background-color: white;
}

.navbar-default .navbar-toggle:hover,
.navbar-default .navbar-toggle:focus {
  background-color: rgba(255,255,255,0.1);
}

/* Add padding to body to account for fixed navbar */
body {
  padding-top: 50px;
}

/* Content wrapper */
.content-wrapper {
  max-width: 1200px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  padding: 40px 30px;
}

/* Remove any box styling from main content */
.main-content {
  background: transparent !important;
  border: none !important;
  box-shadow: none !important;
  padding: 0 !important;
}

/* Override any R Markdown default box styling */
.main-container,
.container-fluid,
.container,
body > .container,
body > .container-fluid {
  background: transparent !important;
  border: none !important;
  box-shadow: none !important;
  padding: 0 !important;
}

/* Remove background from any content sections */
section,
div[class*="section"],
div[class*="content"],
.fluid-row,
.row {
  background: transparent !important;
  border: none !important;
  box-shadow: none !important;
  padding: 0 !important;
  margin: 0 !important;
}

/* Remove any card/panel styling */
.panel,
.card,
.well,
.alert {
  background: transparent !important;
  border: none !important;
  box-shadow: none !important;
  padding: 0 !important;
  margin: 0 !important;
}

/* Headings */
h1 {
  color: #d97706;
  font-family: Georgia, 'Times New Roman', Times, serif;
  font-weight: 900;
  margin-top: 0;
  margin-bottom: 30px;
  font-size: 3em;
  text-align: center;
}

h2 {
  color: #d97706;
  font-family: Georgia, 'Times New Roman', Times, serif;
  font-weight: 900;
  margin-top: 40px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  font-size: 2em;
}

h3 {
  color: #ea580c;
  font-family: Georgia, 'Times New Roman', Times, serif;
  font-weight: 800;
  margin-top: 30px;
  margin-bottom: 15px;
  font-size: 1.5em;
}

/* Text styling */
p, li {
  color: #555;
  line-height: 1.8;
  margin-bottom: 15px;
  font-size: 1.1em;
}

strong {
  color: #d97706;
  font-weight: 700;
}

/* Team Section */
.team-section {
  margin: 40px 0;
  text-align: center;
}

.team-grid {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(250px, 1fr));
  gap: 30px;
  margin-top: 40px;
  margin-bottom: 40px;
}

.team-member {
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9);
  padding: 30px;
  border-radius: 10px;
  box-shadow: 0 4px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
  transition: all 0.3s ease;
  border: 2px solid rgba(217, 119, 6, 0.2);
}

.team-member:hover {
  transform: translateY(-5px);
  box-shadow: 0 8px 25px rgba(217, 119, 6, 0.3);
  border-color: rgba(217, 119, 6, 0.5);
}

.team-member img {
  width: 200px;
  height: 200px;
  object-fit: cover;
  border-radius: 50%;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  border: 4px solid #d97706;
  box-shadow: 0 4px 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
}

.team-member h3 {
  color: #d97706;
  margin-top: 0;
  margin-bottom: 10px;
  font-size: 1.5em;
  font-weight: 800;
}

.team-member p {
  color: #666;
  margin: 5px 0;
  font-size: 1em;
}

.team-member a {
  color: #d97706;
  text-decoration: none;
  font-weight: 600;
  transition: color 0.3s ease;
}

.team-member a:hover {
  color: #ea580c;
  text-decoration: underline;
}

/* Subtitle */
.subtitle {
  color: #666;
  font-size: 1.2em;
  font-style: italic;
  margin-bottom: 40px;
  text-align: center;
}

/* Responsive */
@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .team-grid {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
  }
  
  h1 {
    font-size: 2em;
  }
  
  .content-wrapper {
    padding: 20px 15px;
  }
}
</style>
